DOC.detailed_description: Determine whether eat bean high fat meal reduce inflammatory response people metabolic syndrome ; thereby possibly postpone diagnosis diabetes chronic inflammatory disease . These researcher also interested consume bean affect length time person stay full meal .
DOC.criteria: Men Women 21 year old old metabolic syndrome 1 . Smokers 2 . Female subject pregnant lactate 3 . Subjects take medication would interfere outcome study i.e . lipid lower medication , antiinflammatory drug ( i.e . ibuprofen ) , dietary supplement 4 . Subjects know allergy intolerance food involve study ( cantaloupe , egg , dairy , wheat , bean , couscous , grape seed extract ) 5 . Subjects actively try lose weight 6 . Subjects unusual dietary habit ( i.e . pica , anorexia nervosa , extreme food restriction , binge and/or purge disorder ) 7 . Subjects addict drug alcohol < 1 year recovery program 8 . Subjects present significant psychiatric neurological disturbance determine primary investigator ( i.e . uncontrolled bipolar disorder ) These subject refer primary care doctor care . 9 . Subjects document atherosclerotic disease , inflammatory disease , diabetes mellitus ( fast blood sugar ≥126 mg/dl ) , uncontrolled hypertension ( ≥ 140/90mmHg ) , liver kidney disease identify routine blood test ( chemistry panel ) . These subject refer primary care doctor care .
